tags.name: rdf-editor
tags.description: An text editor custom element which parses and serializes RDF/JS Quads using a selected RDF format.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description:
Media type of the RDF serialization to use.

Custom parsers and serializers must be added to @rdf-esm/formats-common

properties.name: serialized
properties.description:
The string representation of the RDF graph.

The syntax is not validated until quads getter is invoked.

properties.name: format
properties.description:
Media type of the RDF serialization to use.

Custom parsers and serializers must be added to @rdf-esm/formats-common

properties.name: quads
properties.description:
Array of RDF/JS quads

The getter is async!
